name: Bugs Slayer
description:
Kill Your Bosses with Your Makeshift Weapons!

You are stuck in the dungeon and the Bugs hunt you, Kill them!

CONTROL :

Left Mouse Button  Hold to aim, release to throwWASD Movement
EPickup / Interact
ESC Pause

Credit :

Made with Gdevelop

Backsound :


NOTE :

*Contain minor violence like hitting

*This game is for PC, not Mobile Friendly

*my advice to win : be focus to dodge  enemies projectile
